description: A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.

title: Nightmare on Elm Street, A
description: The monstrous spirit of a slain child murderer seeks revenge by invading the dreams of teenagers whose parents were responsible for his untimely death.

title: Nosferatu
description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

title: Omen, The
description: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

title: Mirror Has Two Faces, The
description: A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.

title: Breaking the Waves
description: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

title: Star Trek: First Contact
description: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

title: Shine
description: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

title: Sling Blade
description: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

title: Jingle All the Way
description: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

title: Preacher's Wife, The
description: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

title: Crucible, The
description: A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.

title: 101 Dalmatians
description: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.

title: Die Hard 2
description: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
description: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
description: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
description: Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
description: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned U.S.S. Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis Planet to recover Spock's body.

title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
description: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

title: Batman Returns
description: Batman returns to the big screen when a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaks havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman.

title: Young Guns
description: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

title: Young Guns II
description: In 1881, cattle baron John Chisum pays a bounty to Patrick Floyd Garrett to kill outlaw Billy the Kid.

title: Grease
description: Good girl Sandy Olsson (

title: Grease 2
description: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

title: Marked for Death
description: A retired DEA agent is out to hunt down and take out a Jamaican drug posse that has targeted he and his family for murder.

title: Under Siege
description: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

title: Jaws
description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

title: Jaws 2
description: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

title: Jaws 3-D
description: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

title: My Fellow Americans
description: Two former U. S. Presidents, hated rivals, join forces to expose the current, corrupt President at the risk of their lives.

title: Mars Attacks!
description: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

title: Jerry Maguire
description: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.

title: Raising Arizona
description: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

title: Tin Men
description: A minor car accident drives two rival aluminum-siding salesmen to the ridiculous extremes of man versus man in 1963 Baltimore.

title: Sneakers
description: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

title: Marvin's Room

title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
description: The dim-witted teen duo of Beavis and Butt-Head travel across America in search of their stolen television set.

title: Scream
description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

title: Last of the Mohicans, The
description: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

title: Michael
description: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

title: Hamlet
description: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

title: Mother
description: A neurotic, twice-divorced sci-fi writer moves back in with his mother to solve his personal problems.

title: Evita
description: The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Per√≥n, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

title: Walkabout
description: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

title: Murder at 1600
description: A young woman is murdered in the White House. Homicide detective Regis (

title: Fierce Creatures
description: Zookeepers struggle to deal with the policies of changing directors.

title: First Strike
description: This fourth installment of Chan's Police Story film franchise has our hero trying to locate a missing nuclear warhead.

title: Beverly Hills Ninja
description: A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.

title: Metro
description: A Hostage Negotiator teams up with a Sharpshooter to bring down a dangerous jewel thief.

title: Dante's Peak
description: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

title: Benny & Joon
description: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.

title: McHale's Navy
description: The former World War II Naval captain of PT-73 - now a fun-loving black marketeer - reunites with his crew to battle a bumbling Russian terrorist. Based on the hit 1960s television show.

title: Kolya
description: A confirmed bachelor is in for the surprise of his life when a get-rich-quick scheme backfires - setting off a wild set of circumstances - and leaving him with a pint-sized new roommate.

title: Waiting for Guffman
description: An aspiring director and the marginally talented amateur cast of a hokey small-town Missouri musical production go overboard when they learn that someone from Broadway will be in attendance.

title: Beautician and the Beast, The
description: A New York City cosmetologist, mistakenly thought to be a science teacher, is offered a job to teach the children of an Eastern European dictator.

title: Fools Rush In
description: After a one night stand with Alex, Isabel realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.

title: Absolute Power
description: Career thief Luther Whitney (

title: Vegas Vacation
description: In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

title: Lost Highway
description: After a bizarre encounter at a party with a stranger, a jazz saxophonist is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to prison, where he inexplicably morphs into a young mechanic, gets released, and begins leading a new life.

title: Donnie Brasco
description: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

title: Booty Call
description: Two friends who have gone too long without sex set out to get some.

title: Jungle2Jungle
description: A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.

title: Private Parts
description: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

title: Saint, The
description: Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.

title: Smilla's Sense of Snow
description: A 6 y.o. Inuit boy runs off a snowy roof in Copenhagen and dies. Smilla, a half Inuit who lives in the building and knows the boy, looks into it. What makes an acrophobic boy run up on the roof? The clues take her to Greenland.

description: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.

title: Daytrippers, The
description: When a happily-married woman discovers a love letter written by her husband to an unknown person, she enlists her dysfunctional family to discover the truth.

title: Liar Liar
description: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

title: Selena
description: The true story of Selena Quintanilla, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.

title: Devil's Own, The
description: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

title: Inventing the Abbotts
description: Two working class brothers court three wealthy and beautiful sisters in a small Illinois town.

title: Anaconda
description: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

title: Grosse Pointe Blank
description: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

title: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
description: A mob bagman finds that his luggage, containing the proof of his gang's latest hit, has been switched.

title: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
description: Two dim-witted, inseparable friends hit the road for their ten-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

title: Volcano
description: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles, threatening to destroy the city.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
description: A 1960s secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

title: Breakdown
description: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

title: Fifth Element, The
description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

title: Shall We Dance?
description: A successful but unhappy Japanese accountant finds the missing passion in his life when he begins to secretly take ballroom dance lessons.

title: Addicted to Love
description: Maggie's and Sam's former partners are in love; she wants revenge and he wants his lost love back, so they work together to break up the happy couple.

title: Brassed Off
description: The coal mine in a northern English village may be closing, which would also mean the end of the miners' brass band.

title: Lost World: Jurassic Park, The
description: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

title: Con Air
description: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

title: Pillow Book, The
description: A woman with a body writing fetish seeks to find a combined lover and calligrapher.

title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
description: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

title: Batman & Robin
description: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

title: Hercules
description: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
description: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

title: Face/Off
description: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity of a criminal mastermind, who murdered his only son. The plan turns sour when the criminal wakes up prematurely and seeks revenge.

title: Men in Black
description: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

title: Contact
description: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

title: G.I. Jane
description: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

title: Conan the Barbarian
description: A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa Doom.

title: George of the Jungle
description: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

title: Cop Land
description: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

title: Event Horizon
description: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

title: Spawn
description: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

title: Air Bud
description: An unexpected player joins the school basketball team - a circus dog who escaped from a cruel master.

title: Picture Perfect
description: A young advertising executive's life becomes increasingly complicated when, in order to impress her boss, she pretends to be engaged to a man she has just met.

title: In the Company of Men
description: Two business executives--one an avowed misogynist, the other recently emotionally wounded by his love interest--set out to exact revenge on the female gender by seeking out the most innocent, uncorrupted girl they can find and ruining her life.

title: Conspiracy Theory
description: A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

title: Mimic

title: Air Force One

title: Hunt for Red October, The
description: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine Captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the U.S. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

title: My Own Private Idaho
description: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

title: In & Out
description: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

title: Edge, The
description: An intellectual billionaire and two other men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.

title: Peacemaker, The
description: A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

title: L.A. Confidential
description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Seven Years in Tibet
description: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

title: Kiss the Girls
description: Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

title: Wishmaster
description: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.

title: Game, The
description: After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.

title: U Turn
description: A man heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him is forced to stop in an Arizona town where everything that can go wrong does go wrong.

title: Ulee's Gold
description: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.

title: Ice Storm, The
description: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

title: Chasing Amy
description: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

title: Full Monty, The
description: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

title: Mrs. Brown
description: When Queen Victoria's husband Prince Albert dies, she finds solace in her trusted servant, Mr. John Brown, but their relationship also brings scandal and turmoil.

title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
description: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

title: The Devil's Advocate
description: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

title: House of Yes, The
description: A mentally unbalanced young woman - who is convinced she is Jackie Kennedy - flies into a murderous rage when her brother returns home to reveal he is engaged.

title: Gattaca
description: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

title: Life Less Ordinary, A
description: Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.

title: Eve's Bayou
description: What did little Eve see--and how will it haunt her? Husband, father and womanizer Louis Batiste is the head of an affluent family, but it's the women who rule this gothic world of secrets, lies and mystic forces.

title: Stripes
description: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

title: Bean
description: The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.

title: Mad City
description: A disgruntled security guard holds a school trip group hostage, while a news reporter forms a bond with him.

title: Rainmaker, The
description: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

title: Boogie Nights
description: The story of a young man's adventures in the California pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

title: Witness
description: When a young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder, policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

title: Starship Troopers
description: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

title: Joy Luck Club, The
description: The life histories of four Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

title: Sliding Doors
description: A London woman's love life and career both hinge, unknown to her, on whether or not she catches a train. We see it both ways, in parallel.

title: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
description: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

title: Truman Show, The
description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Wings of the Dove, The
description: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

title: Red Corner
description: An American attorney on business in China is wrongfully arrested and put on trial for murder, with a female defense lawyer from the country the only key to proving his innocence.

title: Jackal, The
description: An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

title: Anastasia
description: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

title: Man Who Knew Too Little, The
description: Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.

title: Alien: Resurrection
description: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

title: Amistad

title: Apostle, The
description: After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts preaching on the radio.

title: Butcher Boy, The
description: The antisocial son of an alcoholic father and a bipolar mother grows up in 1960s Ireland.

title: Deconstructing Harry
description: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.

title: Flubber
description: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: Home Alone 3
description: Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.

title: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
description: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

title: Mouse Hunt
description: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.

title: Scream 2
description: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

title: Sweet Hereafter, The
description: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Tomorrow Never Dies
description: James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the U.K in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

title: Postman, The
description: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

title: Horse Whisperer, The
description: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

title: Jackie Brown
description: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

title: Kundun
description: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.

title: Big Lebowski, The
description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: My Life in Pink
description: Ludovic is an innocent seven-year-old child who provokes horror in his community when he dresses in girls clothes and insists he's a girl.

title: Great Expectations
description: Modernization of Charles Dickens classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

title: Wag the Dog
description: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

title: Dark City
description: A man struggles with memories of his past, which includes a wife he cannot remember, and a nightmarish world, no one else seems to be waking up from.

title: Hard Rain
description: The nephew of an armored-truck driver tries to prevent three million dollars from being taken by a local rival gang during a catastrophic flooding caused by a severe storm.

title: Half Baked
description: The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.

title: Fallen
description: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

title: Spice World
description: World famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

title: Deep Rising
description: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who had already invaded the ship.

title: Replacement Killers, The
description: A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

title: Blues Brothers 2000
description: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

title: Wedding Singer, The
description: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

title: Sphere
description: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

title: As Good as It Gets
description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: King of New York
description: A drug kingpin is released from prison and seeks to take total control of the criminal underworld in order to give back to the community.

title: U.S. Marshals
description: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

title: Love and Death on Long Island
description: Giles De'Ath (Sir John Hurt) is a widower who doesn't like anything modern. He goes to movies and falls in love with movie star Ronnie Bostock (Jason Priestly). He then investigates ...

title: Suicide Kings
description: A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.

title: Man in the Iron Mask, The
description: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

title: Wild Things
description: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

title: Paulie
description: Paulie, a talking parrot, recounts his travels looking for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.

title: Fireworks
description: Nishi leaves the police in the face of harrowing personal and professional difficulties. Spiraling into depression, he makes questionable decisions.

title: Primary Colors
description: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the U.S.

title: Object of My Affection, The
description: A pregnant New York City social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.

title: Lost in Space
description: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

title: Mercury Rising
description: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

title: Mis√©rables, Les
description: Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.

description: The relationship between four female temps all working for the same credit company is threatened with the arrival of a new hire, who lands a permanent position one of the women was vying for.

title: Dr. Dolittle
description: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

description: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

description: Young Native American man Thomas is a nerd in his reservation, wearing oversize glasses and telling everyone stories no-one wants to hear. His parents died in a fire in 1976, and Thomas was...

description: One year after the events of

description: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

description: Tom the Piper's Son is about to marry Mary Quite Contrary. On the eve of their wedding, evil miser Barnaby hires two henchmen to drown Tom and steal Mary's sheep, cared for by Little Bo ...

description: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

description: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

title: Last Temptation of Christ, The
description: The life of

description: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

description: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

title: Mighty Ducks, The

description: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

description: Tia and Tony visit Los Angeles, but he's quickly kidnapped by an evil scientist, leaving her to desperately search for him.

title: Return to Oz
description: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

title: Rocketeer, The

title: Sleeping Beauty
description: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

title: Tron
description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

title: Swing Kids
description: A group of teens adores forbidden music in Nazi Germany just before the outbreak of World War II.

title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
description: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

title: L.A. Story

title: Grand Canyon
description: The fates of several people are intertwining randomly. Their sympathy of each other faces multiple differences in their lifestyles.

title: Outsiders, The
description: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

title: Lord of the Rings, The
description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.
In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

title: Dead Zone, The
description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

title: Maximum Overdrive
description: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

title: Needful Things
description: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.

title: Cujo
description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

title: Children of the Corn
description: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believes that everyone over age 18 must be killed.

description: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

title: Addams Family, The
description: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
description: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

title: Snake Eyes

description: After the animal communicating veterinarian goes too far for his clientele, he and his friends escape their hometown to the sea in search of the Great Pink Sea Snail.

description: A lazy, incompetent middle school teacher who hates her job, her students, and her co-workers is forced to return to teaching to make enough money for breast implants after her wealthy fianc√© dumps her.

description: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

title: Horrible Bosses
description: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

title: Cars 2
description: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

description: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor in this action drama.

description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
description: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

title: Guard, The
description: An unorthodox Irish policeman with a confrontational personality is partnered with an up-tight F.B.I. agent to investigate an international drug-smuggling ring.

title: Friends with Benefits
description: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

description: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

description: On the night of the discovery of a duplicate Earth in the Solar system, an ambitious young student and an accomplished composer cross paths in a tragic accident.

description: Healthcare professionals, government officials and everyday people find themselves in the midst of a pandemic as the CDC works to find a cure.

title: Moneyball
description: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

title: Avengers, The
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
description: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6.

title: Ides of March, The
description: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.
Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

title: The Artist
description: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

title: Take Shelter
description: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

title: Real Steel
description: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling ex-boxer feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

title: Thing, The
description: At an Antarctica research site, the discovery of an alien craft leads to a confrontation between graduate student Kate Lloyd and scientist Dr. Sander Halvorson.

description: Kevin's mother struggles to love her strange child, despite the increasingly dangerous things he says and does as he grows up. But Kevin is just getting started, and his final act will be beyond anything anyone imagined.

description: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

description: Two pairs of parents hold a cordial meeting after their sons are involved in a fight, though as their time together progresses, increasingly childish behavior throws the discussion into chaos.

title: Margin Call
description: Follows the key people at an investment bank, over a 24-hour period, during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.

description: Johnny English goes up against international assassins hunting down Chinese Premier Xiang Ping.

title: Shame
description: A sex addict's carefully cultivated private life falls apart after his sister arrives for an indefinite stay.

title: Headhunters
description: An accomplished headhunter risks everything to obtain a valuable painting owned by a former mercenary.

title: Puss in Boots

description: When a group of hard-working guys find out they've fallen victim to their wealthy employer's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his high-rise residence.

title: Adventures of Tintin, The
description: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

title: Hugo
description: In 1931 Paris, an orphan living in the walls of a train station gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

description: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his 2 human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.

description: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

description: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.

title: Grey, The
description: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

title: Intouchables
description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Chronicle
description: Three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.

description: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

description: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

description: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.

description: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

description: An incumbent Representative embroiled in personal scandal faces a no-holds-barred challenge from a naive newcomer funded by two unscrupulous billionaire lobbyist brothers.

description: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

description: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

description: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader

description: After a highly unusual zombie saves a still-living girl from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion events that might transform the entire lifeless world.

description: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

title: Django Unchained
description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: Impossible, The
description: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

title: Mis√©rables, Les
description: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

description: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

title: This Is the End
description: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in

description: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

description: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

description: A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.

description: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

description: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

description: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

description: Wolverine comes to Japan to meet an old friend whose life he saved years ago, and gets embroiled in a conspiracy involving yakuza and mutants.

description: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

title: Prisoners

title: Rush
description: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals

description: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

title: Don Jon

title: Blue Is the Warmest Color
description: Ad√®le's life is changed when she meets Emma, a young woman with blue hair, who will allow her to discover desire and to assert herself as a woman and as an adult. In front of others, Ad√®le grows, seeks herself, loses herself, and ultimately finds herself through love and loss.

title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
description: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

title: Captain Phillips
description: The true story of Captain
